FuncDef: When enabled, the router sends the MAC address of the remote end (typically the DHCP client) in theremote-idsuboption of the DHCP packet. This command identifies the host at the other end of the circuit. If disabled, theremote-idsuboption of the DHCP packet will be left empty.

ParaDef.Info: This keyword specifies the MAC address of the remote end is encoded in the suboption.
